name: KOREOPSIS Resin
description: The songs on the current record appear with a fierce combination of modern, brutal Death Metal, an opulence of breaks, loose jazzy inserts and a thick atmospheric heavyness. These trimmings result in a pretty dodgy mini album teeming with diversion. The mastering was made by Colin Davis / Imperial Mastering Studio (Vile, Disgorge, Deeds Of Flesh, etc..) For fans of Immolation, Ephel Duath & Gorod.

name: TRIBES OF CAIN Retaliation
description: On Retaliation the band releases a storm of harsh though melodic black death metal. Expect almost 60 minutes of mighty high-speed blasts, gloomy midtempo parts and deviant melodies. The sophisticated graphical concept unfolds on the full coloured digipack and the 16 page booklet. Retaliation was mixed by Jochen Sachse (Pink Cream 69) at the HOFA-Studios in Karlsdorf, Germany and mastered by Peter in de Betou (Opeth, Amon Amarth, Dark Funeral, Hypocrisy, â€¦) at Tailor Maid Production in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: AMAGORTIS Pre-Natal Cannibalism
description: Aggressive and slamming Brutal Death Metal with much groove. Fitted with a sick artwork by Mike Majewski. Brutality at its finest! For fans of Devourment, Putrid Pile & Severe Torture.

name: CARNAL DECAY Carnal Pleasures
description: Now, the CARNAL DECAY is coming with their first album “Carnal Pleasures” on Fastbeast Entertainment. This 10-track album comes with a brutal sound, guttural vocals and groovy but blasting drums as well. CARNAL DECAY plays a style related to bands like GORGASM, old-DYING FETUS or DEEDS OF FLESH.

name: BAALPHEGOR Post Earthquake Age
description: “Post Earthquake Age” is a Death Metal bomb on highest level! BAALPHEGOR are celebrating a firework with catchy riffs, double bass attacks, aggressive Vocals but as well winded down gadgets bringing surprising moments. The Sound, very transparent and powerful, was right produced, mixed and mastered by band’s guitarist David Fernandez himself. All songs are phenomenal recorded and serve always a good drive – great !
